title: Biodegradability of unheated and laboratory heated dissolved organic matter
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00383C, Paper
Saraf Islam Promi, Courtney M. Gardner, Amanda K. Hohner
Heated dissolved organic matter (DOM) was more biodegradable than unheated DOM which may have implications for aquatic biogeochemical cycling and water quality in fire-impacted watersheds.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
